title: Natively Adaptive Interfaces: A new framework for AI accessibility
description: A collage of four images, the first of a woman with curly hair in front of a silver laptop, the second of the same woman and a man with short black hair speaking on a stairwell, the third of a the same man with glasses, and an aerial image of NTID
